body_html:
Hi @drpngx,

Eugene @ebrevdo is revising the dynamic_rnn_decoder and I believe he wants to hold off all developments involving dynamic_rnn_decoder for the moment.

PS: while I'll try my best to provide as much inputs as I can, it's probably better to assign these requests to a software engineer for timely responses.

-Thang

body:
Hi @drpngx,

Eugene @ebrevdo is revising the dynamic_rnn_decoder and I believe he wants to hold off all developments involving dynamic_rnn_decoder for the moment.

PS: while I'll try my best to provide as much inputs as I can, it's probably better to assign these requests to a software engineer for timely responses.

-Thang
